scripts.prebuild: node -e "var fs = require('fs'); if(!fs.existsSync('public/static')){fs.mkdirSync('public/static');fs.mkdirSync('public/static/js');}else if(!fs.existsSync('public/static/js')){fs.mkdirSync('public/static/js');}" && shx cp ./node_modules/barkoder-wasm/barkoder.wasm public/static/js && shx cp ./node_modules/barkoder-wasm/barkoder_nosimd.wasm public/static/js
